geom = DSSC_1MGeometry.from_h5_file_and_quad_positions(sample_xfel_geom,
    QUAD_POS)
pixelpos = geom.get_pixel_positions()
assert pixelpos.shape == (16, 128, 512, 3)
px = pixelpos[..., 0]
py = pixelpos[..., 1]
assert -0.15 < px.min() < -0.1
assert 0.15 > px.max() > 0.1
assert -0.2 < py.min() < -0.12
assert 0.2 > py.max() > 0.12
np.testing.assert_allclose(px[(0), 1::2, (0)] - px[(0), 0::2, (0)], 
    0.000236 / 2)
